help.title: Here is the list of the available commands :
help.rp1: To reply to a message, type
help.rp2: (with x the message ID to reply).
help.rp3: If you don't know it, only type
help.rp4: , then choose the ID of the message you want to reply
help.rp5: Then, press [ENTER], and you will be able to write and send your answer !
help.privatecmd: To send a private message to the group 'groupname' (only people that will have a 'groupname' section in discussionGroupKeys in config.json with the corect Key will be able to decrypt the message)
help.gp1: To filter message by group, type
help.gp2: , and to go back to general
help.gp3: Be careful, if you are in a group channel and you send a message, it will only be sent to the group.
help.unsafecmd: To send an unsafe message (no encryption)
help.modtitle: Here is the list of MODERATORS commands
help.delcmd: To delete the message with the id x
